pullrequest.title: [Blueprint] Add support for moving and rotating models

content.raw:
Other TODOs that may come in this PR or separate PRs.

* add key bindings for switching between transform modes
* update style sheet / icon colors
* show bounding box when model is selected \(requires porting dynamic lines features to ign-rendering\)
content.html:
Other TODOs that may come in this PR or separate PRs.

  • add key bindings for switching between transform modes
  • update style sheet / icon colors
  • show bounding box when model is selected (requires porting dynamic lines features to ign-rendering)
